definition: a claimant to the throne or to the office of ruler, usually without just title
details:
noun
- a claimant to the throne or to the office of ruler, usually without just title
= example: a claimant to the throne or to the office of ruler, usually without just title
- a person who professes beliefs and opinions that he or she does not hold in order to conceal his or her real feelings or motives
= synonyms: phony
- a person who makes deceitful pretenses
= synonyms: fraud
